title: Fragment, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: Fragment shows a pastoral scene with two men and a woman in the foreground. One man plays a flute as the other man takes the hand of a woman kneeling on the ground. In the background, figures are dancing around a maypole. In purple on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, early 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. 1906-15-54.
